description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for theme management in a calendar frontend application, defining styles for light and dark themes as well as responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, applying theme styles and centering content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the application logo, containing size and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the application, setting background and layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links in the application, applying theme colors and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the button to toggle between light and dark themes.
